name: serviceprovider
description:
The ServiceProvider or DBC Open Platform is the API for the danish public libraries.

The ServiceProvider provides access to DBCs services. The purpose is to make a unified, easy-to-use way to access the different bibliographic APIs. The serviceprovider works as a gateway to other services, and does not include the actual search/database/etc. logic.

scripts.start:sp: SMAUG=http://localhost:3000 MOCK_FILE=apitest/mockdata.json SWAGGER_HTTP=true TEST_DEV=true forever -w --watchDirectory src/ --killSignal=SIGTERM src/main.js
scripts.swagger:validate: curl localhost:8080/v1/swagger.json > swagger.json ; swagger validate swagger.json
scripts.test: SMAUG=http://localhost:3000 LOG_LEVEL=off mocha --compilers js:babel-register --recursive src/**/__tests__/* src/__tests__/*
scripts.coverage: SMAUG=http://localhost:3000 LOG_LEVEL=off babel-istanbul cover _mocha --report json --dir ./coverage/units -- --recursive src/**/__tests__/* src/__tests__/*
scripts.cukes: LOG_LEVEL=off SMAUG=http://localhost:3000 MOCK_FILE=apitest/mockdata.json SWAGGER_HTTP=true TEST_DEV=true NODE_ENV=cucumber cucumber.js --compilers js:babel/register features
scripts.cukes:cover: LOG_LEVEL=off SMAUG=http://localhost:3000 MOCK_FILE=apitest/mockdata.json SWAGGER_HTTP=true TEST_DEV=true NODE_ENV=cucumber-coverage babel-istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/cucumber.js --report json --dir ./coverage/cukes -- --compilers js:babel/register features
scripts.cukes:junit: LOG_LEVEL=off SMAUG=http://localhost:3000 MOCK_FILE=apitest/mockdata.json SWAGGER_HTTP=true TEST_DEV=true NODE_ENV=cucumber-junit cucumber.js --format=json --compilers js:babel/register features | cucumber-junit > feature_report.xml
scripts.collect:coverage: istanbul-combine -d coverage -p summary -r lcov -r html coverage/cukes/coverage-final.json coverage/units/coverage-final.json
scripts.before:commit: npm run lint && npm run coverage && npm run cukes:cover && npm run collect:coverage && npm run sonar

author: dbcdk
